easiness noun [U]
(COMFORT)
the quality of being comfortable or relaxed, or free from worry or pain: I enjoyed great easiness and comfort during my father's life. He didn't understand why other people didn't have the same easiness as him. Synonym
ease See
easy
More examplesFewer examplesThere's an easiness to our friendship - there's no tension or expectation on either side. I remember him for his smoothness and easiness of relating to people.He has an easiness that I admire and try to emulate.
